name: Microscope Slide
specifications: Rectangular glass plate (~75 x 25 mm, 1 mm thick) with a smooth, transparent surface.
function: Used to hold and prepare specimens for examination under a microscope.
usage: Wear gloves; use forceps to handle slides; place a drop of sample on the slide, cover with a cover slip, then place on the microscope stage.
maintenance: Handle by the edges; dispose of broken slides in a sharps container; clean for reuse according to lab guidelines.
warning: Touching the flat surface, causing contamination or breakage.
